website_summaries.verdict: Rugged construction site radio that's proven to perform consistently in all weather conditions.
pros: Radio resists rain, dust, and shock
Roll-cage design offers maximum protection against impact
Comes with 10 station presets for added convenience
Offers a 9-foot attached power cord that's simple to store
cons: Sometimes hard to pick up FM channels

customer_reviews.title: 6,8,9 months hibernated-turned back on-warranty stinks-next hibernation saying goodbye for good
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 12/2018-all good until 9/2019. Wouldn't turn on.Tried different outlets,etc. nothing. Today went on manufacturer website to return. Need to pay to ship back from MA to CA then also include a money order/check to cover return shipping/handling/insurance/packaging (ugh!) not the best 1-yr warranty. Before boxing, we plugged in again and guess what? it turned on. This is the 3rd time this has happened, frustrating. We are going to keep radio, next time it doesn't turn on we are going to give it a non-pleasant send off! Our new radio will not be this same kind again! which is sad because it's so cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: erc from MA.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Rugged Outdoor or Indoor Radio
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 over the last 4 years. One for our front porch, one for my husband when he works around the house, and one for my mom since she loved ours and has been begging for one for 2 years for Christmas. They are rugged and worth every penny I paid for them. The battery backup is awesome also. They are all still going strong years after purchase. Will buy again if something happens to them.
customer_reviews.author: MissyBelle

customer_reviews.title: The perfect weather proof and dust proof radio for outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: I have a horse who is on complete stall rest. I needed a weather proof, specifically dust proof radio to play music for him to help break the boredom. The Sangean LB-100 ultra Rugged Compact AM/FM Radio was exactly as described and exactly what I needed. Reception and sound quality are very good. The volume and tuning controls are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C.

customer_reviews.title: I love it.  Just a no-frills AM FM radio that works great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so impressed! I live in an area with radio reception that is challenging, particularly for AM radio. My car radios get it but this is the first AM radio outside of a car that gets decent reception. I have a home stereo, a boom box, etc. and all have AM static. Even this one gets some static in certain positions but at least I can turn it until the static disappears. The tone is great. The reception is great. I love the controls, with a tuning knob but discrete digital frequencies, and presets. i like that it works on batteries or 120v power. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: DLC90266

customer_reviews.title: It's OK but
customer_reviews.text: Note I give 3 stars if order arrives on time and works as it should, 4 or 5 is something is exceptionable reception is good Sound quality is acceptable considering price with one exception which is the bass, a deep thump thrown in at seemingly random times, I really do not need loud thumps while listening to the news, weather, or, DJ. It's annoying and distracting and really doesn't add to the music and there is no way to adjust it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything on this radio works great except for the reception because of the very small ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything on this radio works great except for the reception because of the very small antenna. It's even worst if you are indoors. The solution to this is get a long car antenna with a 4mm thread fitting on ebay or aliexpress. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Herman

customer_reviews.title: too bulky for a simple radio
customer_reviews.text: I want to preface that I already have two Sangean Radios and love them! If you're looking for a rugged AM/FM radio that has an exposed wrap around 110v cord, this is a good item. for me, it's too bulky and heavy for just a simple digital AM/FM radio. it's design is not friendly for home use, it's bulkiness is not friendly for portability so unless you're going to use this at a construction site/playground, sorry but I cannot recommend
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Mine Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, it is sturdy and heavy, would be a great radio - if it worked. Mine did not work out of the box. I sent it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Hinn

customer_reviews.title: All it needs for a 5 rating is an aux port
customer_reviews.text: This is a substantial radio, seriously sturdy, easy to use and set stations, reception and sound quality is very good, but I'm bummed it doesn't have an aux port to play my mp3 as well, was gonna get the blue one but I don't have smart devices at work, so didn't need that, but I should've read the specs a liiiiittle more closely. I'm keepin' it anyway, got it for work, I'll just get a speaker for the mp3 and enjoy the radio for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Margtc

customer_reviews.title: Good solid construction, with great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this item so much, its the 3rd one I have purchased! The first was for my covered patio and had such a deep rich sound that workers asked where I purchased it. The second was a present for a friend, who loved it! The 3rd one was for my spouse, who wanted one for the workshop. The fact that I purchased this same radio should be proof that I really am impressed with the sound and quality of this product!
customer_reviews.author: R. Leblanc

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice Radio. Very Sturdy and somewhat heavy even without the batteries. The Volume is adequate as this will be played mainly inside. I wish it had Base and Treble controls but the overall sound quality is good(If you want to rock-out you'll need to get a boom-box instead) The roll cage is perfect for the shop/garage environment. Good radio for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Reviews and Answers mixed between models
customer_reviews.text: Sent back because this one doesn't recharge as several reviews indicated. What good are the reviews and answered Q's when they're all lumped in together, several different models, but that part isn't separated? Buyers don't know which is with which many times. That's either careless or purposefully deceptive since they have little to nothing to lose in returns. Annoying, and doesn't have to be this way.
customer_reviews.author: MyReviews

customer_reviews.title: Seems tough, sounds good, plenty loud enough
customer_reviews.text: I needed for a house remodel jobsite. I haven't dropped it (yet) but seems sturdy. Sangean has been known a long time for good quality radios. I also needed digital tuner and this tuner is crisp and clear for every station I picked up. Never gone over about half volume which is fairly loud. Zero distortion. Sound is on the bassy side but that's way better than tinny. It wasn't the cheapest option but this vs a boombox... I think it was a good decision.
customer_reviews.author: Third Shift

customer_reviews.title: Great radio for working out in the yard and garage
customer_reviews.text: This radio works very well. The only problem so far is when using the radio on batteries, they only lasted a few hours of use. I have rechargeable the rechargeable batteries a second time. I'll give them one more try.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Nice job, a great radio.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a great radio. It is a digital AM/FM radio with no other bells or whistles. This is exactly what have been trying to find. It is also tough, proven by my husband being clumsy and it still works just fine. We live on a fringe area and most stations will not come in without a lot of static. We now receive these desired stations as though we were next door to the antenna. This is not one of those "mini" or "micro" size radios, it is a stout 14x14" (approximate) size. Nice job, a great radio.
customer_reviews.author: Dee J.

customer_reviews.title: I first bought this for my parents which there happy with (simple to operate)
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this for my parents which there happy with (simple to operate). I like the sound so much I bought one for my self. Radio puts out good amount of bass with nice lows with out to much mid-range. Reception decent. Am OK but you turn box to grab AM reception for built in antenna. Had 4 C batteries going for about 4 hours-(alkaline) and batteries still had some life it appears. I did email Sangean to enquire about an antenna a little longer and they never got back to me, so that's what they think about me.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Manner

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great radio and it is exactly what I was looking and hoping for. The construction is terrific and I believe it will stand up in many different conditions. The sound quality and reception is excellent. While I do not intend to use rechargeable batteries, I did not find a switch in the battery compartment as information suggested, that I believe would engage the recharging function. Again, this is not an issue for me and I could have misunderstood information.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton Bond

customer_reviews.title: Survived a fall to the ground
customer_reviews.text: Great, durable. We put it in the barn so the horses will have music at night. One of them must have not liked one of the songs one night as she knocked it off the shelf it was on, between two stalls, (it landed on the dirt outside stalls) and it is still in perfect condition. She does play with it to the extent she can reach it, which is really to just nudge it with her nose for the most part, and the frame protects it. So it is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Easy Stars
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this radio six stars, I would. It arrived very well packed in its own box. Very easy to set up, plug in and fall in love with the speaker. I swear, this radio sounds WONDERFUL. Excellent clarity, great bass. Sounds like an expensive boom box. I love the ease of tunning, presets, adjusting volume. You would have to work hard to damage this radio. I couldn't be happier with this purchase and it's timely arrival. I highly recommend this radio.
customer_reviews.author: S. Block

customer_reviews.title: DON'T DO IT!!
customer_reviews.text: This radio was awesome when we first got it. I bought it for my husband for the bakery he works in. The sound was fantastic. Here we are less than 2 years later and it is dead. The volume knob just stopped working. It was not dropped or anything, it just stopped. My brother-in-law took it apart to see if a wire was loose, but it's just a metal component so there's no fixing it. Total bummer. Shoddy workmanship or what?? What a rip off. You would hope that this thing would have lasted for several years with the heavy duty caging and everything. So disappointed. NEVER will buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It turn out way better than I thought it would. I haven't the problems others have said in reviews. Mine is on back porch turned on 24 hours with no problems so far. Sounds very good. It is under the porch roof but it is still exposed to the weather and rain, seems to be holding up well. Now, it is not a high tech stereo or anything like that. Just a plain simple well built weather resistant radio. Fits my needs very good. My 6 grandkids love it also and they haven't broke it yet. Some of the kids will getting one for Christmas I think.
customer_reviews.author: johnny maddox

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is bass-heavy but very good. I like it that way so I can ...
customer_reviews.text: This radio is solid. The sound quality is bass-heavy but very good. I like it that way so I can use it for background sound and ignore it, or focus on the music if I want. The reception is better than my other radios. I only have a few stations that I listen to so the tuning buttons are excellent. Very good value!
customer_reviews.author: William Highfield

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, but not good audio quality
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking radio, but quite heavy. It must contain ballast. Unfortunately the audio quality was quite poor. Too much bass, not much highs, voices not clear. My 25 year old cheapo transistor radio that the Sangean was to replace sounded better. If I had no choice, I could probably make do with it, but since it is a disappointment, I'll take advantage of Amazon's easy return policy.
customer_reviews.author: PRS

customer_reviews.title: Rugged case. Good sound.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to tune with digital dial. Has frequency lock to prevent FM drift. Uses 4 C Cells for remote use or 117VAC . Do not use rechargeable batteries. This has no charger and may damage the power circuit. Looks like it could take a lot of abuse like putting in the trunk with tools stacked on top without damage. Colorful case looks like De Walt radio.
customer_reviews.author: Lee J Walker

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY......TUNES IN WELL!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this radio as a gift for “the man” to use in his shop which has pole barn walls. So far, it works great, and picks up more stations than any radio he’s had. He hasn’t used batteries yet so I can’t comment on that yet. It’s a nice rugged radio, and perfect for people working in any kind of construction zone. I would recommend this radio!! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Good Investment.
customer_reviews.text: 2019 - update on this product. First published in 2016 and it's still working as when it was first published. This is my outside radio here in the Valley of the Sun. Rain or Shine has not failed me once. This little radio is an excellent investment. Clear Audio, High Volume, Great Frequency Range (Intercity). The programable frequency setting is a great feature. Best of all it's weather proof. I've left it outside... rain, sun, dust storms and rain again. Still works and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great reception!
customer_reviews.text: Just GREAT!! My shop is in the basement where I assumed the reception was bad because of the location. All I wanted was a simple radio that received a good FM signal. This radio is clear as a bell. Am so happy with this radio. Update 6/18: The signal has degraded so much. It was crystal clear when I first got it. Now, I can barely hear though the static. Of course , the return period is over by now. I do NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rico Lebrun

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous sound and reception!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased! Ordered this to use on porch. The sound and reception are fantastic! Plus it's cute! I was afraid it would be cheap looking being made out of adtic but it is actually heavy for its size and is sturdy and well made. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Jones

customer_reviews.title: BIG AND HEAVY, BEST SUITED FOR OUTDOORS
customer_reviews.text: I have had other Sangjean radios, and think they had "normal" tones. This one seems to be unbalanced in favor of bass, not enough treble. I mainly use it to listen to talk radio while working outside, and it suits that use well. It seems very robust and rugged, but so far, it hasn't been put to any real test to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: Mo H.

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a RADIO.  I got a box that puts out static
customer_reviews.text: Almost no stations, sound is horrible worse than radios in Wyoming, in the 60s and that was BAD
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable reception
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in my basement because it is supposed to have good reception. In my basement other radios get only one station and not very good. This radio gets every station that I listen to and has great reception on them all. On a scale of 1-5 I would give it a 10! I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: clifford kinnett

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought 0ne. Quit working within 30 days. Sent me replacement. Didn't last 6 months. Radio stays in my shop, so not beat around. For the money expect a lot better than that. Going to replace with different brand. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Dunning

customer_reviews.title: Decent radio on AC, but eats batteries when using DC...
customer_reviews.text: Its a ok radio when run on ac, but will eat batteries when on dc. I have a at least 25 year old portable Panasonic, that will go several months even a year on batteries...the Sangean maybe 2 weeks...never had a radio use up batteries as this does. Also sound tends to be a more soft or bass sound..not a deal breaker for me, but if your buying it for portability (battery use)...expect to go through a battery change very often....
customer_reviews.author: Northern lights

customer_reviews.title: Money wasted.
customer_reviews.text: This radio has poor quality FM reception in our area. A longer FM Antenna might help. Most FM stations are very sensitive to radio location and orientation. We cannot receive some of our favorite FM station without static regardless of radio position. Now we have a nearly useless radio and will have to buy another more expensive radio. I gave it 2 star because the AM reception is OK fir most stations in our area.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond M.

customer_reviews.title: Volume Issue??
customer_reviews.text: We have had this radio for a little over a year and the volume just stopped working. We googled the problem on-line and found its a real issue. Does any one know if there is a fix?
customer_reviews.author: emramos

customer_reviews.title: Bought for work
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the quality of the product. I wish the antenna folded instead of straight up position. Working in construction and utilizing it on the job site I'm sure the antenna will get snapped off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big orange
customer_reviews.text: It did not have ear phone jack. That why I send it back. You see I sometimes knock my radio down I break the knobs or the antenna. I sleep with the radio. So I needed ear phone jack. It's a great radio.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact Radio
customer_reviews.text: I have this radio in my garage. It works great! Very good reception, sound quality is great for a compact radio. It is easy to operate which is perfect for when you are doing other things while having the radio on.
customer_reviews.author: G. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a site that would compare radios based on their ability to pull in distant stations. I live in a rural area and many favorite stations are 50 to 90 miles away. I wouldn't classify this one as a "super radio" but it is plenty adequate for my needs. It pulls in AM and FM stations OK and has adequate volume and good tone. Nice to have a radio to listen to a game.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Griffioen

customer_reviews.title: who would steal this?  My EX?
customer_reviews.text: It lasted 3 months until it disappeared. I took it everywhere on the weekends. Everyone I met wanted one as this was rugged and went picnicing, camping, to the beach. Sand, moisture, handling were no longer a restraint. Highly appreciated it, as long as I had it. I am buying another.
customer_reviews.author: David Lenz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and really nice
customer_reviews.text: This radio works very well for me in my barn. Reception inside barn is hard some days but when it picks up the radio is nice to have and be able to listen to my favorite channels. Even if it gets knocked down by anyone or a horse it still works good. Would buy a second one if I need it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great radio!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a very loud factory environment with no problem hearing it with my ear plugs in. The bass (not adjustable) makes it even better for my use on the job. And the fact that it's JUST a radio with no plug ins for devices pretty much guarantees that no one will be "borrowing" it to use when I'm not there. I have never had to raise the volume more than half way. Fantastic radio!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M. Oakman

customer_reviews.title: No equalizer
customer_reviews.text: Text specs show that this unit has a 6-level equalizer, it does not. Additionally, the A M BAND would not pick up a single station in a major city with the unit sitting outside. Very disappointed thought this was the one.
customer_reviews.author: Greyman48

customer_reviews.title: They last
customer_reviews.text: My last model lasted eight years, antenna disintegrated! Signal faded & could not stay on station with the dial tuner anymore! The new one has digital tuner! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mad Murf

customer_reviews.title: Easy to spot because of its cool color
customer_reviews.text: The radio is exactly as described- not complicated, attractive, extremely rugged and versatile and well made.Easy to spot because of its cool color. It has a large speaker that broadcasts over a large area. The speaker has more base to it than treble which takes a little getting used to especially if you listen to music using earphones with an mp5 player or other portable device. I like it because it is designed for heavy duty use and you don't have to worry about it breaking easily. The carry handle makes it easy to grab and the cord winds up in the back. Fits nicely on a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Real Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I live in a rural area (Maryland's Eastern Shore). I got this for my workshop so I could listen to NPR and music stations. I cannot get a signal on any of the stations I wanted it for. I can barely get a signal from commercial FM music or AM stations either. I've tried to improve the antenna by attaching a wire to it, but it's no better. I have a Sanjean shower radio which works fine and is able to get nearly all stations I want to hear. But not this one. If you are in a fringe area, better look for another productl.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Simple am/fm radio with quality build and sound.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for a specific use. Uses 4 c batteries or plug to 110v. Product is sturdy yet light. The sound from the single speaker is surprisingly good. Was looking for a decent sounding am/fm radio that could live at the cabin. No aux, CD or bluetooth. Perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D.

customer_reviews.title: it's solid-- not sure it's worth the money compared to more reasonably price alternatives.
customer_reviews.text: seems solid. I bought this for my barn, and I have trouble getting a signal (as has been the case with more reasonably priced radios-- my hope was spending this much money I'd have a better product/reception). It does seem rugged, and I will keep it anyway, even though it did not really solve my situation.
customer_reviews.author: bstras

customer_reviews.title: The sound is good and I don't find the bass to be excessive
customer_reviews.text: This is ideal for outdoor use and when I'm working out in the gym. The sound is good and I don't find the bass to be excessive. It is rugged and well built , and perfect for my needs. My Sangean collection of radios keeps growing as this is my third one.
customer_reviews.author: Fareed Rajack

customer_reviews.title: Great radio--good reception.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this radio as a gift for my farmer husband, and he really likes it. He mostly listens to the AM stations--sports talk usually. He carries this radio around on the farm when working in various places, and then leaves it in the shop otherwise, to listen to while working there. He said it is a much better radio then the one he had--no comparison at all. This one has no static on his stations no matter where he has taken it so far. He likes the sturdiness of it, and it is not very big, so that's also a plus. I am very pleased with this purchase, and the $60 paid was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Cordelia Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Best radio I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I bought my 2nd radio because I like this model so well. Seems to get good reception and is sturdy. I put one in my barn which is not heated and I have one in the house.
customer_reviews.author: David Riebau

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: It is a heavy duty radio. I purchased it to have music to garden by. Sound is clear and concise, volume is unbelievable out of such a compact radio. Haven't dropped it or had any accidents with it so I cannot remark on durability. Will actually be buying another as a Christmas gift for a relative.
customer_reviews.author: Tizon

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Would not pick up a local channel. Must have been a defective one. We did not replace.
customer_reviews.author: laurie mullins

customer_reviews.title: Lunch box radio
customer_reviews.text: A perfect gift for my son who paints for a living. He has had many a "boom box" and says this one, by far, is his favorite one. And he says he never leaves home without it...lightweight, not bulky and super easy to carry, too!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Camgros

customer_reviews.title: Gifted to my mom.  She loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 72 year old mom loves this radio. Comes in very clear, nice and loud, and easy to move. It's made her very happy to hear the news or her oldies whenever she wants now. So happy to have given her something she truly needed and wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Nice1

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: great buy for what it is - one speaker that puts out a little too much bass for radio listening [so even if you try to turn it down low it still is pretty loud].
customer_reviews.author: jonny c

customer_reviews.title: Short Life Span
customer_reviews.text: Radio sound is good but reception was fair at best. Purchased to use on my screened in porch. Radio worked for 18 months and quit. It was not exposed to any direct rain or sun in it's protected environment. Warranty is 12 months but if it fails in the that period you are responsible for shipping cost to manufacturer and an $8.00 return shipping fee. I will be purchasing another brand for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: SRS

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Good radio! I got the radio to replace my GE Super radio from 1985. I just bought it to take along on my pontoon boat to listen to baseball games at a vacation home in southeast Ohio. The radio does the job! It gets a good signal for about a 60 mile radius? I have not tried AM stations too much so no help there. I think AM stations are hard on to get on any radio due to more cell towers and wi fi stuff in the air?? Just guessing on that. Easy to use and sounds just fine to me. I might buy another for my primary home. Still need to wait and see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Odin

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Used rechargeable batteries and got about a week’s use out of it. It would be nice if the plug was detachable and that it could charge the batteries instead of having to use a separate battery charger.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy C

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this radio for about a month but so far it has worked out perfectly. It locks on to the FM stations without drifting and unlike the Eton that I replaced it with, I do not need to constantly move it around to keep the stations in tune. I don't use the AM band so I can't comment on that. The speaker is big and carries the sound very well outside where I use it. I also like the built in AC cord that doesn't require an external transformer. My only reservation is that I hope it is reliable over the long term. Too soon to tell.
customer_reviews.author: R. Traum

customer_reviews.title: Works great in Metal Building
customer_reviews.text: Great radio! It is used in a 21,000 sq ft metal building with welders and machine shop and it gets excellent reception. Very easy to move around and to program. Plan on getting more for the shop!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A radio that’s just a radio
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good radio for the price, loud and durable. As other reviewers have already stated, if you are using batteries and turn the volume all the way up, it will sound as if the bass cannot handle the sound. Also the attenna for this is weak, sometimes I have to move the radio around room to get a better signal. I still believe it’s a good buy if all you are looking for is a durable radio with no added features.
customer_reviews.author: Watch-man

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Loud enough and clear enough. Only thing is uses batteries don't last long. Other then that I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Andy and Renee  Angstrom

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this unit to replace an old warehouse radio that was falling apart. This thing is great. Puts out a ton of sound and the programmable stations are a huge time saver. This unit specifically gets used 10+ hours a day in a very large (tall) warehouse for ecommerce. Excellent addition at a reasonable price. It could easily be a great work / job site radio or just something to have in the garage at home. Highly portable and I believe it has two different power methods. Cord or battery.
customer_reviews.author: ColorMeSilly

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son, and he loves it! He uses it everyday and appreciates how sturdy the radio is. This radio is highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JKK

customer_reviews.title: very big
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize when I ordered this that it was a true jobsite radio, but that is exactly what it is. Very rugged, water-resistant, and heavy. Having said all of that, we have owned several small digital radios over the years which have been knocked into dishwater, dropped onto the floor, and knocked over (all with bad results). We have also misplaced those other radios from time to time. I don't think any of those will be a concern with this radio. The tuner seems to be quite good, and the sound level is impressive.
customer_reviews.author: K Nellans

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor radio
customer_reviews.text: This is my second......This one purchased for a friend, for Christmas. He has admired mine. My original was purchased four years ago. It's great! Good reception....even for some 30-mile+ stations. It got caught in the rain a couple times, with no ill effects. It's gotten knocked down numerous times; no problems. Use it mostly unplugged. The four C-cells (alkaline) last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sound
customer_reviews.text: We left this out on our deck all summer and twice it rained hard before we realized it was not protected. I am happy to say it is still working and has very good sound for a little unit. It is not a fancy name brand, but delivers on quality.
customer_reviews.author: Momwith2boys

customer_reviews.title: My new work companion...
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy having the radio going when in my workshop or doing DIY projects on weekends. Had been getting by with a cheap clock radio, but left it out one night and a drizzle in the night took care of that. Decided to take a plunge for something a little more substantial. Didn't tell my wife, but when she saw it, she commented on how nice it is for purposes I described, so a winner on the most important check. Good sound, but best part is the rugged support to take the beating from my grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use it in a dusty barn where it’s abused. Periodically gets water sprayed, filthy dirty and takes a 3’ fall onto concrete. It keeps on working beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Bhw

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality sound- rich sound but a little heavy on bass sound. Receives all the major stations in my area
customer_reviews.author: tomahawk

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased This Sangean LB-100; it is a very solid little radio perfect for camping or the beach. The radio is constructed of a very heavy gauge plastic, The roll bars have rubber feet, and the cord is built in with no wall wart. I hate it when Amazon does not post photos that show size/scale, here are the overall dimensions: 12 1/8" horizontally across the front, 9 1/4" high (12 1/2" w/ ant), 7 1/2" deep. (note the rubberized antennae does not retract or fold in any way.) The packaging was good, and the unit arrived in good condition. The English instructions are well written, very strange.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Dimas

customer_reviews.title: Bad Reception !!!
customer_reviews.text: The Reception was Terrible !!! Some Very Good Radio Stations in the area but this Radio won't pick them up !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Make a difference

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, compact radio
customer_reviews.text: I am just thrilled with this one. The sound quality is fabulous. Small footprint. Easy to use. Cannot go wrong with this one/
customer_reviews.author: Catherine W

customer_reviews.title: tough enough and has good reception, but the base over powers your music
customer_reviews.text: As a work radio, it seems to be well constructed, tough enough and has good reception, but the base over powers your music. If i am listening to talk radio, it is sometimes hard to understand also... It's a shame they haven't added some base control.
customer_reviews.author: Raph

customer_reviews.title: This has worked great so far both with the cord and with batteries
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great so far both with the cord and with batteries. It is easy to use and the station setting is very easy to read. Left outside playing on a wet day and still works fine. Have not had to adjust tuning as it has been clear sound.
customer_reviews.author: Falcone

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor use in the garden, needs tone controls
customer_reviews.text: Been using this radio for 9+ months. It's been rained on and manhandled without any noticeable damage. Would have preferred bass and treble controls over the preset equalizer, sometimes AM talk radio is a little "bass-y" no matter what preset it's on but overall a good radio. PROS: Long, sturdy 9' AC cord that's attached to the radio so it can't get lost; cord winder; solid; decent battery life and reception. CONS: Lack of basic tone controls.
customer_reviews.author: Inger

customer_reviews.title: My dad no longer feels bad when he accidentally leaves his radio outside after having ...
customer_reviews.text: My dad no longer feels bad when he accidentally leaves his radio outside after having a night time bonfire -- especially if it had been raining. This thing has lasted years! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: WOW I'm Impressed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This way beyond what I expected!! While the radio is compact in size, it REALLY can BLAST the music!! It's very rugged, looks good, and runs on both 120 current and C batteries... I'm VERY pleased with it and HIGHLY RECOMMEND anyone looking for an outdoor radio for around the House, Basement, Garage, or Work Site BUY this, you won't be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Faryna

customer_reviews.title: Replacement radio works great, well made
customer_reviews.text: The first order I placed arrived with the radio defective--would not power up with AC power; So I returned that unit. The replacement works great as hoped . . . the 5 inch speaker gives nice deep bass and great sound, and the digital tuner is sensitive. The radio looks robust and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Carbon

customer_reviews.title: Great radio poor manufacturer support
customer_reviews.text: I love these radios because they have excellent sound and are weather resistant, which is why I ordered a second one. Unfortunately the second one showed up with an antenna. I tried to report the problem to Amazon and was referred to the manufacturer. The product support link did not provide a number to call or any way to communicate the issue. I tried the "register" link and it said that function was unavailable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best little radio ever.
customer_reviews.text: My husband takes it outside to do his yard work, in the garage when he is working and fishing at the waterfront. Tough but good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Lady

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a birthday gift for my husband. He likes working outside and it is a good durable outside radio for him
customer_reviews.author: barb0710

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Very rugged and sounds great! We use it in garage when working on cars,etc... I didn’t know it had a SLEEP mode so didn’t rate that. It’s “manly “ looking too!😉
customer_reviews.author: Traci M.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality overall
customer_reviews.text: I have limited mobility and dexterity. This radio is easy for me to grip and handle. The frame around the radio protects it from breaking if I accidentally drop it. I use it outside and it’s supposed to be waterproof which will help if I forget to bring it inside. It is constructed well for someone with my disabilities. It has great sound and the knobs are easy for me to handle
customer_reviews.author: Big g

customer_reviews.title: The sound is amazing and clear which means she doesn't keep the neighborhood ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hearing-loss mother as her old FM was done. The sound is amazing and clear which means she doesn't keep the neighborhood awake with Rush Limbaugh every night. It is her go-to radio in bedroom now.
customer_reviews.author: JC Boily

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect radio for my shop. Great reception on all my favorite AM and FM channels.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Little power house
customer_reviews.text: My go to portable radio. Great sound deep tone and very well made. Love the preset feature.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Scott

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love this radio!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this radio! The sound is awesome & portability is great! He uses it in the garage & also around the pool. It is weather proof too. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: MU Fan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Sound---WAAAY too much BASS! DON'T BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: If the unit had decent fidelity, it would be a winner. I'm not a snobbish audiophile, but this radio (maybe just the speaker) is muffled and bassed-out to the max. Annoying for anything but talk radio. Virtually no treble and very little mid-range comes through. I waited too long to unbox and use or it would have gone back immediately. DEFINITELY NOT WORTH THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy radio to use, simplicity is good. Only problem I have is speaker quality. Even if I had to pay more upgrade the spesker but still buy.🤗
customer_reviews.author: Bill Vasquez Jr.Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great radio!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this radio. Great sound and reception! Rugged. Works great in my shop. Have always liked the Sangean brand for quality and excellent reseption on hard to reach stations.
customer_reviews.author: mjv

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & durable.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for a great price. Bought this for my father in law - he had to go to sleep with the radio on - full blast & on an 'AM' station (hard of hearing). He has since past and now I use it daily in my shop.
customer_reviews.author: Savantco_Kid

customer_reviews.title: Durable, great reception!
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased one years ago, and my husband loved it so much we bought another one. Great reception, easy to move from house to shop and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome reception
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this radio to replace one I had dropped (one too many times) and finally broke. This radio has the best reception I have ever experienced. I am able to get all stations clearly inside my large metal garage. The display is very easy to read and the buttons are large so you can change the station without taking off your gloves. I carry it to where ever I am working, so the batteries and sturdy handle are very useful. Speaker is very clear and has nice volume control.
customer_reviews.author: PHA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Bass is a bit much and i have to play at a lower volume than i want for some songs. Alot of talk radio is impossible to listen to on this unless played really low volume. But it is very ruged and batteries are lasting me anout 40 hours! Makes my workday so much easier ;) Update. Ive had this for 6 months using it monday-friday for 8-10hrs. It is still going strong. Ive figured out it gives you the "e" low battery message and shuts off; but if you flip the batteries around then they will last another 8 hours
customer_reviews.author: zombie_cmdr

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY! A radio that does what it says! Excellent reception, sound is great for someone like me with extreme hearing loss. Wonderful volume control and most importantly, I'm impressed with the electrical cord! Over 3' long and will actually reach the outlet or you can use batteries. Excellent, Excellent, Excellent. The only radio that has reception for the station I want to listen to. Built like a rock!!
customer_reviews.author: kenneth

customer_reviews.title: MUSIC CAN BE CALMING AND SOOTHING TO AUTISTIC PERSONS
customer_reviews.text: MY NONVERBAL DEVELOPMENTALLY DELAYED 35 YEAR AUTISTIC GRANDSON HAS BEEN USING THIS RADIO SINCE WE DISCOVERED IT YEARS AGO. OVER THE YEARS, WE HAVE REPLACED IT SEVERAL TIMES. HE IS IN A GROUP HOME {HAS HIS PRIVATE BEDROOM} AND THE RADIO IS HIS MOST PRIZED POSSESSION. HE SLEEPS WITH IT EVERY NIGHT AND BRINGS IT BACK AND FORTH 0N HIS BI-WEEKEND HOME VISITS. THE ONLY PROBLEM IS, HE WILL, AFTER A TIME, TAKE THE ANTENNA OFF AND ON AND IT BECOMES LOST. DO YOU SELL ANTENNA REPLACEMENTS.
customer_reviews.author: Mel N.

customer_reviews.title: No bad for a no frill radio
customer_reviews.text: Best money i spent on a basic am, fm radio great sound if u don't mind it not being stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Tinman

customer_reviews.title: Great radio!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this radio as a gift for my husband, who likes to carry a radio around with him as he does yard work. As he is very rough on the radios he carries around the yard, I was looking for a more "industrial"-type radio for him. This one is perfect! It's rugged, with a flexible antenna (regular antennas tend to break easily), it gets great reception (even on AM stations!), and has awesome sound quality. My husband is more than pleased with this radio. I'm very glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: SRMay

product_meta.title: Sangean LB-100 Ultra Rugged Compact AM / FM Radio
product_meta.description:
Sangean's compact-size utility work site LB-100 (Lunchbox) AM/FM Digital PLL synthesized tuner includes leading-edge features. It offers best-in-class reception, durability, rain/dust/shock resistant, superior sound quality and convenience. It makes this radio suitable for both in and outdoor not to mention its simple operation and made for tradesman who enjoy their music while at a job-site. The lunchbox features a flexible antenna and a digital PLL synthesized tuner for better reception and has an AM/FM digital tuner with a large back-lit LCD display to ensure excellent visibility. The lunchbox has durable ABS plastic construction. Its impact-resistant material is just one aspect that makes this radio suitable for use on building sites. The lunchbox is the best compact job-site radio in the industry. It also has 5 Easy touch memory presets for each of your favorite AM/FM stations. The lunchbox has rugged design that resists water, dust and shock. It's perfect for outdoor job site conditions. Rugged rotary tuner and volume control knobs make this radio easy to use. Equipped with a 5 inch weather-resistant speakers with high-quality full-range sound, providing sufficient audio quality especially in noisy environments.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Rugged design resists water, dust and shock, perfect for outdoor job sites
Equipped with a 5 inch water resistant speaker delivering powerful, full-range sound Compact utility worksite radio offering best in class reception and durability. View larger
Long rubber cable can quickly and easily
rolled up on the back of the unit Sangean's compact utility worksite radio, the LB-100 Lunchbox AM/FM Digital PLL Radio Tuner, includes leading-edge features while offering best-in-class reception, durability, and rain/dust/shock resistance--all with superior sound quality and convenience. The Lunchbox features a flexible pivoting antenna and digital PLL tuner for better reception and has an AM/FM digital tuner with a large backlit LCD display to ensure excellent visibility. It makes this radio suitable for both in- and outdoor work and is ideal for tradesman who enjoys their music while at a job-site.

RUGGEDIZED AND RESISTANT
The Lunchbox has durable ABS plastic construction. Its impact-resistant material is just one aspect that makes this radio suitable for use on building sites. It's also water-resistant for protection on rainy days, as well as dust-resistant. Ruggedized tuning knobs ensure long life of dependable operation.

Equipped with a 5-inch water-resistant speaker with high-quality full-range sound, the Lunchbox provides sufficient audio quality especially in noisy environments. The rugged Lunchbox exterior is ready for your next outside job, or any other outdoor adventure.

LCD DISPLAY
An easy-to-read LCD display shows you station and time. The segment-style LCD screen measures 2.24" x 0.98", and is backlit to be easy to see even across a room.

CONVENIENT RADIO FUNCTIONS
PLL synthesized tuning provides exact, fade-free reception. Twelve Memory Presets for 6 AM or 6 FM station selection are available and easily visible in the large LCD display. It also has 5 easy touch memory preset buttons for quick access to your favorite AM/FM stations.

BUILT-IN CABLE TIE
While operating on batteries the 2.7-meter long rubber cable can be quickly and easily rolled up on the back of the unit to avoid tripping over it while at a job site.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
 * Display: LCD
 * Display Size: 2.24" x 0.98"
 * Memory Presets: 12 (6 AM, 6 FM)
 * Tuner Type: PLL synthesized AM/FM
 * Dial Type: Rotary
 * Equalizer Presets: 6, with Bass Boost
 * Speakers: 1 x 5" full-range
 * Waterproof: JIS4-standard waterproofing
 * Input Power: AC, Four (4) C Batteries
 * Dimensions: 11.8" x 7.3" x 9.1"
 * Weight: 6lb 9.8oz
feature_bullets: Rugged Industrial Grade Digital PLL Synthesized AM / FM Radio with 10 Station Memory Presets (5 AM, 5 FM) and Dynamic Loudness
Rain Resistant to JIS4 Standard, Dust and Shock Resistant with Rubber Shock-Blocks
Compact Roll-Cage Protective Design Resists Impacts and Drops while Remaining Highly Portable, Rugged Rotary Tuning and Volume Controls with Durable ABS Plastic Body
5 1/4 Inch Water Resistant High Powered Speaker, Backlit Display and Compact Flexible Antenna
Operates with 9-foot Attached AC Power Cord or 4 C Batteries (not included)
